title: Tangerine Dream - Stuttgart - 27.05.2014 - FLAC
description:
This is a re-upload from Dime. I haven't changed anything. My 1st torrent.
Feel free to comment. The text below is the whole "readme". Enjoy the sets.
Track 7 & 22 are from the new cupdisk - currently a tour-exclusive one. If You happen to be on a gig - buy one. I will post a low quality version (ogg, mono, ~192 kbps (~100 in mono, 1 channel) for a preview if I buy the CD. 

Tangerine Dream Stuttgart 2014-05-27 ka audio

technical details:
------------------
audience audio master recording
seating: TribÃƒÂ¼ne, Row 5, Seat 22 (10m to stage, a bit left from center)
Zoom H2 placed at foot level due to active security
	Front Mics 90 deg, Mic Gain Low, Rec. Level 50%, 44kHz 16bit WAV

result:
	peak level was very low, ca -20db, I was too cautious with the rec level setting
	frequency range ok, but 95% of RMS energy in 20-400Hz range

post-processing in Adobe Aufdition 1.5:
1. manual damping of isolated loudness peaks (clapping etc.)
2. Hard Limiter to -21db, look-ahead 7ms, post 100ms
3. 20-band Graphic Equalizer, master gain 15db
